msg: Merge fix from trunk to 1.3.3 branch for TUSCANY-2635: Pool stateless-scoped Java impl instances

author: sjanuary
msg: Fix failing archive tests to run on the bootclasspath

author: ate
msg: JS2-871 - Upgrade Pluto container to version 2.0
- detangle ExtendedDescriptorService from the Pluto PortletAppDescriptorService (just use it internally)
- this service is no longer needed to be passed on as PlutoService
- moved all descriptor processing/loading logic into this one service: web.xml, portlet.xml, jetspeed-portlet.xml
- renamed the service to JetspeedDescriptorService to better reflect its expanded resposibilities (doing everything)
- loading/processing web.xml is not implemented yet but coming up soon

author: ate
msg: - decoupling DescriptorService as ContainerService again as its not used/needed by the container itself
- other portals can simply use/extend this interface and/or its implementation but there's no need to tell Pluto about it :)
